verses.verse: אָ֣ז <WH227> 'az Then יָשִֽׁיר־ <WH7891> ya-shir- Then sang מֹשֶׁה֩ <WH4872> mo-Sheh Moses וּבְנֵ֨י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשִּׁירָ֤ה <WH7892> hash-shi-Rah this song הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> haz-zoT likewise לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru and spake לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying אָשִׁ֤ירָה <WH7891> 'a-Shi-rah I will sing לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for גָאֹ֣ה <WH1342> ga-'Oh for he hath triumphed גָּאָ֔ה <WH1342> ga-'Ah, gloriously ס֥וּס <WH5483> sus the horse וְרֹכְב֖וֹ <WH7392> ve-ro-che-Vo and his rider רָמָ֥ה <WH7411> ra-Mah hath he thrown בַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> vai-Yam. into the sea

[which] thy hands
